long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with Time Tracker by slideluxe.com, a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help you efficiently manage and track your time. Perfect for students, professionals, freelancers, and anyone looking to optimize their time management, this extension offers a range of features to make tracking your tasks seamless and effective.

Key Features:
1. Task Management
Add Tasks: Easily add new tasks to your list with a user-friendly input field.
Task List: View all your tasks in a clean and organized list format.
2. Timer Functionality
Start/Stop Timer: Begin and end task timing with just a click, ensuring accurate tracking of the time spent on each task.
Visible Timer: Keep track of your time with a prominently displayed timer that updates in real-time.
3. Background Tracking
Persistent Timing: The timer continues running even if you switch tabs or close the popup, ensuring no lost time.
Background Script: Utilizes a background script to maintain the timer functionality seamlessly.
4. Time Logging
Log Entries: Automatically logs the duration of each task once stopped, providing a clear record of your productivity.
Time Log Display: View your logged times in a dedicated section, with each entry showing the task name and the time spent.
5. Responsive Design
Responsive Input Field: The task entry field is designed to be responsive, ensuring a smooth experience on different screen sizes.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension's interface is clean and intuitive, making it easy to navigate and use.
How to Use:
Add a Task:

Enter the name of your task in the input field.
Click the "Add Task" button to add it to your task list.
Start the Timer:

Select the task you want to start working on.
Click the "Start" button to begin tracking your time.
The timer will update in real-time, displaying the elapsed time.
Stop the Timer:

Once you finish working on the task, click the "Stop" button.
The duration of the task will be logged in the time log section.
View Time Log:

Check the time log section to see all your logged tasks and the time spent on each.
This helps in reviewing your productivity and managing your tasks more effectively.
Benefits:
Improved Time Management: By keeping track of your tasks and the time spent on them, you can better manage your schedule and improve productivity.
Accurate Record Keeping: The extension provides a precise record of the time spent on each task, which is useful for billing, reporting, and personal productivity tracking.
Seamless Experience: The background tracking ensures that your timer continues running without interruption, even if you switch tabs or close the popup.
Easy to Use: The clean and intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to start using the extension right away.
Installation:
Download the Extension:

Visit the Chrome Web Store and search for "Time Tracker by slideluxe.com".
Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to install the extension.
Pin the Extension:

After installation, pin the extension to your Chrome toolbar for quick access.
Click on the puzzle piece icon in the top right corner of Chrome.
Find "Time Tracker by slideluxe.com" and click the pin icon next to it.
Start Tracking:

Click on the Time Tracker icon in your toolbar to open the popup.
Add your tasks and start tracking your time.
